title: Drawing, ""9888 - Two Color or Thre", 1925
medium:
Gouache, Graphite Markings, Gouache on both sides of paper
Support: Tracing Paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at top center: "9888 - Two Color/ or Three" at lower center: "Two Color Design if on White.Ivory/ or Light Color Ground on Dark Grounds", in graphite at lower left: Dr. 22
creditline: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, ""9888 - Two Color or Thre", 1925.
1925. Gouache, Graphite Markings, Gouache on both sides of paper
Support: Tracing Paper. Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg. 1938-82-233.
